thread.section_title: Woodland Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Woodland Direct | woodlanddirect.com | 2 of 93
thread.title: Donald Griswold
thread.title_full: Woodland Direct reviewed by Donald Griswold

author: Donald Griswold
title: Donald Griswold
text: This site sells american made products, which based onthe reviews on amazon on the chinese made steel and cheap cast iron stuff drove me to this site. In addition I have a family member that has purchased a lifetime grate and actually used the warranty through this company. The process was easy and positive. In this day and age that kind of customer service and standing by your products is getting harder to find. The initial cost was higher than the comparable amazon products, but I feel in the long run will easily pay off.
